Edges-Monstrous -- Male Human Seasoned Angel
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6+2 Spirit: d10 Strength: d10 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Divine Might: +2 Strength Step/+2 Vigor Step
Old: +2 Smarts
Skills (16 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4+2 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Fighting: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Healing: (sma) d6 Riding: (agi) d6
Skill Notes:
Faith: +1 Faith Step
Old: +2 Common Knowledge
Size: 0
Advances: 7 Improvement Points: 18 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 6; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (5 points): Aggravated Damage; Angel; Fear -2; Old; Savagery Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Angel: Has Ageless, Beautify, Divine Might, Faith, Flight, Immune To Disease And Poison, Rage, and Servant Of Heaven features
Servant Of Heaven: Has Vow+ feature
Ageless: Does not age
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Chainsaw (2d6+4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Aggravated Damage: Natural and inherent power attacks can hurt supernatural creatures; foe regeneration suffers -4 penalty
Fear-2: Other characters suffer -2 penalty on initial encounter Fear check
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Immune To Disease And Poison: Has immunity to disease and poison
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers a major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Savagery: Wild Attack inflicts an additional +2 damage
Arcana
Arcana Notes: Beautify: May create minor beauty effects
